name: Search Engine Result Number
description:
This style adds numbers beside Google (Web search, Books, and Scholar), Yahoo!, and Bing search results. Also see the styles "Google Result Number (Multi-service)" http://userstyles.org/styles/22244 , "Yahoo! Result Number" http://userstyles.org/styles/22245 , and "Bing Result Number" http://userstyles.org/styles/22243 .

Google のウェブ検索、ブックス、スカラー、Yahoo!、Bing の検索結果の横に番号を振ります。「Google Result Number (Multi-service)」 http://userstyles.org/styles/22244 、「Yahoo! Result Number」 http://userstyles.org/styles/22245 、「Bing Result Number」 http://userstyles.org/styles/22243 もご覧ください。
